title: Hour 3 - Damian Lillard (04-07-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Damian Lillard (04-07-20)
description:
Dan shows his appreciation for the people working on the front lines of the coronavirus pandemic, and Blazers PG Damian Lillard joins the show to talk about the proposed game of HORSE and Kobe's 81 points.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
